title: Go live: production-ready deployment configuration and canonical URL

requirements.text: Ensure the production deployment uses the canonical public URL https://bubbas.big.adventure.com as the single source of truth by setting and documenting the required VITE_PUBLIC_URL environment variable for production builds, matching the existing default in frontend/src/config/publicUrl.ts.
acceptanceCriteria: A production build can be configured with VITE_PUBLIC_URL=https://bubbas.big.adventure.com without code changes.
Documentation in the repo clearly states how to set VITE_PUBLIC_URL for production deployments.

requirements.text: Verify and keep the siteâ€™s share/SEO metadata aligned to the canonical URL https://bubbas.big.adventure.com (canonical link, og:url, twitter:url) so that production sharing previews resolve to the correct domain.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html contains canonical/OG/Twitter URL metadata pointing to https://bubbas.big.adventure.com.
No other hard-coded public URL values conflict with https://bubbas.big.adventure.com.

requirements.text: Confirm the footer social link for Facebook opens exactly https://www.facebook.com/share/1AndNU7trz/?mibextid=wwXIfr in production.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the Facebook icon in the footer navigates to https://www.facebook.com/share/1AndNU7trz/?mibextid=wwXIfr in a new tab.
The link includes rel="noopener noreferrer" for external navigation security.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not edit immutable hook files: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; do not introduce additional backend services.
nonGoals: Adding new site sections, pages, or content changes unrelated to launch readiness.
Implementing non-Internet-Identity authentication or any third-party auth provider integration.
Adding a database or external hosting/cloud infrastructure automation beyond documenting required env configuration.
